title: Method of Relaxation
description: This is a web dashboard I developed that uses the Method of Relaxation for

title: Neutron Scattering Dashboard
description: This is a web dashboard I developed that allows users to interactively
view results from a Neutron Scattering Experiment.

title: Lorentzian Peak Analyzer
description: This is a program I developed for finding, tracking, and fitting
Lorentzian peaks in data. This program allows the user to interactively
preprocess data, and modify the parameters used for
performing peak operations. I developed this application for doing data
analysis and visualization on experiments that make use of Resonant

title: Bulk Rename
description: Command line application that Allows for a user to bulk rename files using an editor, such as vim!
Why waste time writing scripts to rename files when you can use
this program in conjunction with bulk text editing tools?!

title: Random Forest From Scratch
description: This application consists of a Jupyter Notebook I developed that gives
a detailed explanation on how Random Forests work. I developed the Random Forest algorithm
using the Python libraries Numpy and Pandas, and I also show how the algorithm can be used to investigate
the relationship between personality types and substance abuse.
